As a result, a long-standing ambition of AI research is to bypass this...

links.title: AlphaZero: Shedding new light on the grand games of chess, shogi and Go
links.description: In late 2017 we introduced AlphaZero, a single system that taught itself from scratch how to master the games of chess, shogi (Japanese chess), and Go, beating a world-champion program in each case. We were excited by the preliminary results and thrilled to see the response from members of the chess community, who saw in AlphaZero‚Äôs games a ground-breaking, highly dynamic and ‚Äúunconventional‚Äù style of play that differed from any chess playing e...

links.title: MuZero: Mastering Go, chess, shogi and Atari without rules
links.description: In 2016, we introduced AlphaGo, the first artificial intelligence (AI) program to defeat humans at the ancient game of Go. Two years later, its successor - AlphaZero - learned from scratch to master Go, chess and shogi. Now, in a paper in the journal Nature, we describe MuZero, a significant step forward in the pursuit of general-purpose algorithms. MuZero masters Go, chess, shogi and Atari without needing to be told the rules, thanks to its abil...

links.title: Transcript of United Airlines Flight 175 (Published 2001)
links.description: Following is a transcript of the radio communications between the New York Air Route Traffic Control Center [R42] in Ronkonkoma, N.Y., and United Airlines Flight 175 (UAL175), which took off from Logan International Airport in Boston on Sept. 11 and then was crashed into the Pentagon. It includes exchanges with other aircraft in the area at the time. The transcripts were obtained by The New York Times.

links.title: Interpretable Model-based Hierarchical Reinforcement Learning using Inductive Logic Programming
links.description:
Recently deep reinforcement learning has achieved tremendous success in wide
ranges of applications. However, it notoriously lacks data-efficiency and
interpretability. Data-efficiency is important as interacting with the
environment is expensive. Further, interpretability can increase the
transparency of the black-box-style deep RL models and hence gain trust from
the users. In this work, we propose a new hierarchical framework via symbolic
RL, ...
links.original_title: Interpretable Model-Based Hierarchical RL Using Inductive Logic Programming
